title: How to Access Shadow of the Erdtree
description:
Andy got to play Elden Ring Shadow of the Erdtree for a bit and explained how accessing the DLC works.

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ao1A4U9N_pM&pp=ygUJZ2FtZXNjYXN0

transcript_chunks.text: teleport back to the lands between where whenever you want you know change your build if you want which I did uh once and you could just teleport right back and when you open up the map you click in the right stick to go underground or above ground yeah right bumper or R1 essentially takes you to the Shadowland screen
